pr_title: Issue #7446: ensure all checks summaries in sync with checks.xml

timeline.bodyText: Utility methods should go after the method(s) that use them.
timeline.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText: @romani Is there any reason filters don't have their own summary page?
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText: No good reason, but they already all at one page https://checkstyle.org/config_filters.html and one more page for file filters
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText:
Assertions require the page that is being examined, and the check that is being looked at. This is extremely helpful in debugging a failure.
See https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/internal/XdocsPagesTest.java#L1587 as an example. All tests in this class should have assertions like this.
timeline.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText: Please sync the assertion message. Also checkName is in the message twice.
timeline.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText:
getNodeName
Returns the value of the "name" attribute

Shouldn't this be something like getNodeNameAttributeText? Maybe something a little bit shorter, but I don't think the current name expressly says enough about what it is doing.
timeline.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText:
The first sentence should be the summary, but you have it split into 2 and is a bit long.
I think the first sentence should be something like "This santizes the given string for safe use in XML documents." and then list what it specifically does as consecutive sentences.
